name: Jump Heroes
description:
Experience the ultimate thrill of becoming a Jump Hero in this hyper-addictive arcade game! The goal is simple: survive as long as possible, beat your high score, and dominate the leaderboard! Play solo or compete with friends with local co-op mode!

EASY TO LEARN


Our easy-to-learn gameplay puts you in control of your hero on an 8x8 grid, with new obstacles randomly appearing to keep you on your toes. But beware - this game is highly addictive!

HARD TO MASTER


Compete with others for first place in leaderboards.

DIFFERENT MODES


Jump Heroes will be expanded with new modes after the release, challenging you and requiring a new approach to reach the highest scores.

CUSTOMIZATION


Personalize your gaming experience with 22 unique heroes to choose from at launch, with even more coming in future updates.
Unlock them all and show your style!

Get ready to jump to new heights and become a legend in the Jump Heroes.
